torch_connectomics.data.datasets¶

class AffinityDataset(volume, label=None, sample_input_size=(8, 64, 64), sample_label_size=None, sample_stride=(1, 1, 1), augmentor=None, mode='train')[source]¶

PyTorch ddataset class for affinity graph prediction.

Parameters:
  • volume – input image stacks.
  • label – segmentation stacks.
  • sample_input_size (tuple, int) – model input size.
  • sample_label_size (tuple, int) – model output size.
  • sample_stride (tuple, int) – stride size for sampling.
  • augmentor – data augmentor.
  • mode (str) – training or inference mode.
class SynapseDataset(volume, label=None, sample_input_size=(8, 64, 64), sample_label_size=None, sample_stride=(1, 1, 1), augmentor=None, mode='train')[source]¶

Pytorch dataset class for synapse detection.

Parameters:
  • volume – input image stacks.
  • label – synapse masks.
  • sample_input_size (tuple, int) – model input size.
  • sample_label_size (tuple, int) – model output size.
  • sample_stride (tuple, int) – stride size for sampling.
  • augmentor – data augmentor.
  • mode (str) – training or inference mode.
class SynapsePolarityDataset(volume, label=None, sample_input_size=(8, 64, 64), sample_label_size=None, sample_stride=(1, 1, 1), augmentor=None, mode='train')[source]¶

Pytorch dataset class for synapse detection (polarity mask).

Parameters:
  • volume – input image stacks.
  • label – synapse masks.
  • sample_input_size (tuple, int) – model input size.
  • sample_label_size (tuple, int) – model output size.
  • sample_stride (tuple, int) – stride size for sampling.
  • augmentor – data augmentor.
  • mode (str) – training or inference mode.
class MitoDataset(volume, label=None, sample_input_size=(8, 64, 64), sample_label_size=None, sample_stride=(1, 1, 1), augmentor=None, valid_mask=None, mode='train')[source]¶

Pytorch dataset class for mitochondira segmentation.

Parameters:
  • volume – input image stacks.
  • label – synapse masks.
  • sample_input_size (tuple, int) – model input size.
  • sample_label_size (tuple, int) – model output size.
  • sample_stride (tuple, int) – stride size for sampling.
  • augmentor – data augmentor.
  • valid_mask – the binary mask of valid regions.
  • mode (str) – training or inference mode.
class MitoSkeletonDataset(volume, label=None, sample_input_size=(8, 64, 64), sample_label_size=None, sample_stride=(1, 1, 1), augmentor=None, valid_mask=None, mode='train')[source]¶

Pytorch dataset class for mitochondira segmentation.

Parameters:
  • volume – input image stacks.
  • label – synapse masks.
  • sample_input_size (tuple, int) – model input size.
  • sample_label_size (tuple, int) – model output size.
  • sample_stride (tuple, int) – stride size for sampling.
  • augmentor – data augmentor.
  • valid_mask – the binary mask of valid regions.
  • mode (str) – training or inference mode.
